pkgmetadata.longdescription: Straightforward Filtering Index for AP-MS Data Analysis (SFINX) // The straightforward filtering index (SFINX) identifies true positive protein interactions in a fast, user-friendly, and highly accurate way. It is not only useful for the filtering of affinity purification - mass spectrometry (AP-MS) data, but also for similar types of data resulting from other co-complex interactomics technologies, such as TAP-MS, Virotrap and BioID. SFINX can also be used via the website interface at http://sfinx.ugent.be.
